original_text: I know that this is what happens to the homes of evil people. It happens to people who turn away from God.’ I know that this is what happens to the homes of evil people.
korean_text: 참으로 불의한 자의 집이 이러하고 하나님을 알지 못하는 자의 처소도 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: I know that this is what happens
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이런 일이 일어난다는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: to the homes of evil people
